author: Rebecca Sargent
method: Fry the onions and garlic in a little oil until soft, add the tomato, beans and a dash of water and cook for 10 minutes until almost dry. Add ½ tsp smoked paprika and a drizzle more olive oil and season with salt and pepper.  Pour the beans on top of the toast and eat straight away.
ingredients: ½ onion, finely chopped,  ½ clove garlic, sliced,  1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil,  1 tomato, chopped,  1 x 400g tin pinto beans, drained and rinsed,  ½ tsp smoked paprika,  sea salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 slice sourdough, toasted
